string-array.name: cards_tooltip
string-array.item: Strength is represented by the best combination of 5 cards.
ROYAL FLUSH: 5 cards in sequence from Ace to Ten all in same suit.
STRAIGHT FLUSH: 5 cards in sequence all in same suit.
4 OF A KIND: 4 cards of the same rank.
FULL HOUSE: 3 cards of the same rank + 2 cards of another same rank.
FLUSH: 5 cards of the same suit.
3 OF A KIND: 3 cards of the same rank.
2 PAIR: 2 cards of the same rank + 2 cards of another same rank.
1 PAIR: 2 cards of the same rank.
HIGH CARD: Made of any five cards not in any of the above combination.
